data.lore:
A vicious Void predator, Kha'Zix infiltrated Valoran to devour the land's most promising creatures. With each kill he absorbs his prey's strength, evolving to grow more powerful. Kha'Zix hungers most to conquer and consume Rengar, the one beast he considers his equal.

When Kha'Zix crossed over into this world, he was fragile and ravenous. The animals he first encountered were too small to fuel the rapid evolution he craved. Kha'Zix focused his hunger on the most dangerous creatures he could find, risking his life to satisfy his need. With each kill he feasted and changed, becoming a stronger, faster predator. Kha'Zix soon chased his prey with unrestrained aggression, believing he was unstoppable. One day, while savoring a fresh kill, the predator became the prey. From cover a creature pounced in a blur of fangs and steel, tackling him to the ground. It roared in his face slashing and clawing, and Kha'Zix felt his blood spill for the first time. Screeching in fury, he sliced at the brute's eye driving it back. They fought from sunset to sunrise. Finally, near death, they reluctantly separated. As his wounds closed, Kha'Zix burned with anticipation at the idea of devouring one who could match the Void's strength. He resumed his search for powerful prey with renewed vigor. Someday, Kha'Zix will feast on Rengar.

''Kill. Consume. Adapt.''
-- Kha'Zix
data.name: Kha'Zix
data.title: the Voidreaver

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Marks enemies who are isolated from nearby allies.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If the target is isolated, the damage is increased to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

Evolved Enlarged Claws: If target is isolated, the damage is increased to {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Increases the range of Taste Their Fear and Kha'Zix's basic attacks by {{ e5 }}.
spells.description: Kha'Zix passively marks enemies that are isolated from nearby allies. Taste Their Fear deals physical damage to a single target. Damage increased on isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Enlarged Claws, this deals extra bonus damage against isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Marks enemies who are isolated from nearby allies. Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If the target is isolated, the damage is increased to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}). Evolved Enlarged Claws: If target is isolated, the damage is increased to {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Increases the range of Taste Their Fear and Kha'Zix's basic attacks by {{ e5 }}.
spells.name: Taste Their Fear
spells.sanitizedDescription: Kha'Zix passively marks enemies that are isolated from nearby allies. Taste Their Fear deals physical damage to a single target. Damage increased on isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Enlarged Claws, this deals extra bonus damage against isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.

spells.tooltip:
Fires exploding spikes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies (20% bonus damage to monsters) and slowing them for {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Heals Kha'Zix for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) if he is within the explosion radius.

Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone, slowing enemies hit by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. If the target is a champion, Kha'Zix gains vision of them for 2 seconds (does not affect stealthed units).
spells.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that slow and deal physical damage to all nearby enemies. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone and Void Spike's slow effect is increased.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Fires exploding spikes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies (20% bonus damage to monsters) and slowing them for {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Heals Kha'Zix for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) if he is within the explosion radius. Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone, slowing enemies hit by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. If the target is a champion, Kha'Zix gains vision of them for 2 seconds (does not affect stealthed units).
spells.name: Void Spike
spells.sanitizedDescription: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that slow and deal physical damage to all nearby enemies. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone and Void Spike's slow effect is increased.

spells.tooltip:
Leaps to a target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range. On champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.
spells.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases dramatically. Also, on champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Leaps to a target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range. On champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.
spells.name: Leap
spells.sanitizedDescription: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases dramatically. Also, on champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Ranking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities.

Active: Stealths for {{ e1 }} second. Activates Unseen Threat and increases Kha'Zix's Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%. Additionally, Kha'Zix ignores unit collision while stealthed. Void Assault can be cast a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Evolved Active Camouflage: Void Assault can be cast three times and its duration increases to {{ e4 }} seconds.
spells.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Void Assault stealths Kha'Zix, triggers Unseen Threat, and increases Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Active Camouflage, Void Assault can be cast three times and stealth duration increased.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Ranking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities. Active: Stealths for {{ e1 }} second. Activates Unseen Threat and increases Kha'Zix's Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%. Additionally, Kha'Zix ignores unit collision while stealthed. Void Assault can be cast a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds. Evolved Active Camouflage: Void Assault can be cast three times and its duration increases to {{ e4 }} seconds.
spells.name: Void Assault
spells.sanitizedDescription: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Void Assault stealths Kha'Zix, triggers Unseen Threat, and increases Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Active Camouflage, Void Assault can be cast three times and stealth duration increased.

passive.name: Unseen Threat
passive.description: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.
passive.sanitizedDescription: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.
